title: Calories in 85/15 Ground Beef
meta_description: Learn calories in 85 15 ground beef per 100g, including fat, protein, carbs, and full nutrition facts for raw portions.
assumptions: Raw ground beef, 85% lean / 15% fat, no added seasonings or fillers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact lean-to-fat ratio, processing, and cooking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of raw 85/15 ground beef provides ~215 kcal, 18.6 g protein, and 15 g fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Pan-broil and drain fat (per 100 g raw becomes ~85 g cooked)
Add 1 tsp vegetable oil for cooking per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 85 15 ground beef per 100 g?
faqs.a: Approximately 215 kcal for raw 85/15 ground beef.

faqs.q: What is the protein content in 85/15 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 18.6 g protein per 100 g raw.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 85 15 ground beef?
faqs.a: 15 g total fat per 100 g, including 5.9 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Are these calories for raw or cooked ground beef?
faqs.a: Raw; cooking methods like broiling can increase calories per gram due to moisture loss.

faqs.q: Does cooking change the calories in 85/15 ground beef?
faqs.a: Yes, drained cooked versions often have 230-250 kcal per 100 g due to fat and water loss.
